error.not_found: Sorry, there is nothing to show here.
error.precondition_required: This request is required to be conditional; try using "If-Match".

broadband_coverage.description: {contribution, number} % of private households have access to broadband internet.
broadband_coverage.input_prompt: How many private households will have access to broadband internet?
broadband_coverage.label: broadband coverage — private households

charging_stations.description: There are {contribution, number} charging stations per 1.000 citizens.
charging_stations.input_prompt: How many charging stations per 1.000 citizens will be there?
charging_stations.label: charging stations

co2.description: {contribution, plural, one {# ton of CO₂ emissions will be saved.} other {# tons of CO₂ emissions will be saved.}}
co2.input_prompt: How many tons of CO₂ will be saved?
co2.label: CO₂

co2_emissions_households.description: {contribution, number} tons of CO₂ are emitted per capita by private households.
co2_emissions_households.input_prompt: How many tons of CO₂ will be emitted per capita by private households?
co2_emissions_households.label: CO₂ emissions by private households

co2_emissions_industry.description: {contribution, number} tons of CO₂ are emitted per capita by industry, trade and services.
co2_emissions_industry.input_prompt: How many tons of CO₂ will be emitted per capita by industry, trade and services?
co2_emissions_industry.label: CO₂ emissions by industry, trade and services

co2_emissions_transport.description: {contribution, number} tons of CO₂ are emitted per capita by the transport sector.
co2_emissions_transport.input_prompt: How many tons of CO₂ will be emitted per capita by the transport sector?
co2_emissions_transport.label: CO₂ emissions by transport

cycle_path.description: {contribution, plural, one {# kilometer of cycle paths will be built.} other {# kilometers of cycle paths will be built.}}
cycle_path.input_prompt: How many kilometers of cycle paths will be built?
cycle_path.label: cycle path

doctor_ratio.description: There are {contribution, number} doctors per 100,000 citizens.
doctor_ratio.input_prompt: How much will the doctor ratio increase?
doctor_ratio.label: doctor ratio

funding_culture_and_education.description: Cultural and educational institutions are funded with {contribution, number, ::currency/EUR} per citizen.
funding_culture_and_education.input_prompt: How much is the funding for cultural and educational institutions?
funding_culture_and_education.label: Funding of cultural and educational institutions per capita

organic_farming.description: {contribution, number} % of the total utilized agricultural area is used for organic farming.
organic_farming.input_prompt: How much of the total utilized agricultural area will be used for organic farming.
organic_farming.label: organic farming

parking_space.description: {contribution, plural, one {# parking spaces will be repurposed.} other {# parking spaces will be repurposed.}}
parking_space.input_prompt: How many parking spaces will be repurposed?
parking_space.label: repurposed parking spaces

renewable_energy.description: {contribution, number} kilowatt of renewable energy are generated per capita.
renewable_energy.input_prompt: How many kilowatt of renewable energy will be generated?
renewable_energy.label: renewable energy

social_housing.description: The number of social housing units is {contribution, number}.
social_housing.input_prompt: How many units of social housing will be created?
social_housing.label: social housing

solar_energy.description: {contribution, plural, one {# kilowatt hour  of solar energy has been generated.} other {# kilowatt hours of solar energy have been generated.}}
solar_energy.input_prompt: How many kilowatt hours of solar energy will be generated?
solar_energy.label: solar energy

waste_generation.description: {contribution, number} tons of wate are generated per capita.
waste_generation.input_prompt: How much waste per capita will be generated?
waste_generation.label: generation of municipal waste per capita

water_consumption.description: The water consumption per capita is {contribution, number} cubic meters.
water_consumption.input_prompt: How many cubic meters of water will be consumed?
water_consumption.label: water consumption per capita

women_in_elective_office.description: The proportion of women in elective office is {contribution, number} %.
women_in_elective_office.input_prompt: What is the proportion of women in elective office?
women_in_elective_office.label: proportion of women in elective office

women_in_leading_positions.description: The proportion of women in leading positions within the administration is {contribution, number} %.
women_in_leading_positions.input_prompt: What is the proportion of women in leading positions within the administration?
women_in_leading_positions.label: proportion of women in leading positions within the administration
